title: I have made a purchase on the Unity website, but have not received an invoice.

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I purchased an asset on the Asset Store
  • (Alternative) I purchased a Unity license through the web store
  • I have not received an invoice

sections.title: Cause
content: Invoices are usually generated and sent out automatically when we receive payment. It may be that your invoice has been caught by your Spam filters, or has been delayed by an error.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Initially, please check your spam filters or junk folders. We will always send through a confirmation email with a PDF invoice when your purchase has come through.
If you cannot locate the confirmation email in these folders, please get in touch with us here and we will check what has happened to your purchase.
